statements: SELECT * FROM StudentProgress;
SELECT student_id, quiz_score, assignment_score FROM StudentProgress WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, assignment_score, quiz_score FROM StudentProgress WHERE quiz_score > 80;
SELECT * FROM StudentProgress WHERE assignment_score <= 70;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_students FROM StudentProgress;
SELECT * FROM StudentProgress WHERE student_id = 2;
SELECT student_id, quiz_score FROM StudentProgress WHERE quiz_score > 80 ORDER BY quiz_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM StudentProgress WHERE quiz_score < 50 AND assignment_score >= 70;
SELECT student_id, quiz_score, assignment_score FROM StudentProgress WHERE quiz_score >= 60 OR assignment_score < 50 ORDER BY student_id ASC;
SELECT student_id, COALESCE(quiz_score, 0) AS quiz_score, COALESCE(assignment_score, 0) AS assignment_score FROM StudentProgress;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM Students;
SELECT student_id, student_name, student_grade FROM Students WHERE student_grade = 'A';
SELECT assignment_name, assignment_score FROM Assignments WHERE assignment_score > 90;
SELECT student_name, assignment_name, assignment_score FROM Students JOIN Assignments ON Students.student_id = Assignments.student_id;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE student_grade = 'A';
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM Students ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Assignments WHERE assignment_score > 90 ORDER BY assignment_score DESC;
SELECT Students.student_name, Assignments.assignment_name FROM Students JOIN Assignments ON Students.student_id = Assignments.student_id;
SELECT AVG(assignment_score) AS avg_score, MAX(assignment_score) AS max_score FROM Assignments;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT quiz_name, topic, total_questions FROM quizzes ORDER BY quiz_id DESC;
SELECT student_id, quiz_id, score FROM student_progress WHERE score >= 80;
SELECT * FROM student_progress WHERE completed_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM quizzes WHERE topic = 'Math' ORDER BY passing_score DESC;
SELECT student_id, SUM(score) AS total_score FROM student_progress GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT first_name, last_name, completed_at FROM students JOIN student_progress ON students.student_id = student_progress.student_id ORDER BY completed_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, email FROM students ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT quiz_name, quiz_date FROM quizzes WHERE quiz_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT assignment_name FROM assignments WHERE due_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT student_name, assignment_name, score FROM students JOIN student_progress ON students.student_id = student_progress.student_id;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, email FROM students ORDER BY student_name ASC;

SELECT student_name, quiz_name, assignment_name FROM students s JOIN student_progress sp ON s.student_id = sp.student_id JOIN quizzes q ON sp.quiz_id = q.quiz_id JOIN assignments a ON sp.assignment_id = a.assignment_id WHERE sp.score > 80;

SELECT s.student_name, q.quiz_name, a.assignment_name, sp.progress_status FROM student_progress sp JOIN students s ON sp.student_id = s.student_id JOIN quizzes q ON sp.quiz_id = q.quiz_id JOIN assignments a ON sp.assignment_id = a.assignment_id WHERE sp.progress_status = 'completed';

SELECT s.student_name, q.quiz_name, a.assignment_name, sp.score FROM students s LEFT JOIN student_progress sp ON s.student_id = sp.student_id LEFT JOIN quizzes q ON sp.quiz_id = q.quiz_id LEFT JOIN assignments a ON sp.assignment_id = a.assignment_id WHERE sp.score IS NULL ORDER BY s.student_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM students;
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name FROM students ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM quizzes WHERE max_score > 50;
SELECT assignment_name, deadline FROM assignments WHERE deadline > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name FROM students ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT s.first_name, s.last_name, q.quiz_name, sq.score FROM students s JOIN student_quizzes sq ON s.student_id = sq.student_id JOIN quizzes q ON sq.quiz_id = q.quiz_id WHERE sq.score > 80;

SELECT s.first_name, s.last_name, a.assignment_name, sa.status FROM students s JOIN student_assignments sa ON s.student_id = sa.student_id JOIN assignments a ON sa.assignment_id = a.assignment_id WHERE sa.status = 'completed';

SELECT s.first_name, s.last_name, q.quiz_name, sa.status FROM students s JOIN student_quizzes sq ON s.student_id = sq.student_id JOIN quizzes q ON sq.quiz_id = q.quiz_id JOIN student_assignments sa ON s.student_id = sa.student_id WHERE sq.score < 50 AND sa.status = 'pending';
